title: Ransom
description: The Redemption Series Book 2 Vengeance is the path of the Damned. It is not a path taken lightly. For a Naphil, it could mean ransoming his soul. ~Bezaliel~ Dayton Blainey is caught between two Heaven and Hell. Bound to a Demon she's beginning to care about, she is thrown into an adventure she may not survive. But she will try. Separated from her friends, she is forced to use powers she just discovered she had while surviving the wrath of a Demon queen. She will be tested. And in the search for a ring that may unbind her from Marcas Craig, Dayton will discover that the bond between an Angel and a Demon goes much deeper than blood. She will endure.
author: R.K. Ryals
